nodes.text: The Trevura droid resistance was a resistance group that operated on the Inner Rim world of Trevura during the Galactic Civil War.

The Imperial Governor of Trevura, Merno Blask, was anti-droid and made life on the planet very difficult for them. A group of them formed an underground resistance movement that opposed his rule and they hired the assassin droid S-R6 to kill him.
